members.member: IFilter return codes
Success
The function was denied access to the filter file.
The function encountered an invalid handle, probably due to a low-memory situation.
The function received an invalid parameter.
Out of memory
Not implemented
Unknown error
File not filtered due to password protection
The document format is not recognised by the filter
No text in current chunk
No more chunks of text available in object
No more text available in chunk
No more property values available in chunk
Unable to access object
Moniker doesn't cover entire region
Unable to bind IFilter for embedded object
Unable to bind IFilter for linked object
This is the last text in the current chunk
This is the last value in the current chunk
Convenience class which provides static methods to extract text from files using installed IFilters

member.name: T:Protean.Tools.Image.CaptchaImage
member.summary: CAPTCHA image generation class
member.remarks:
Adapted from the excellent code at http://www.codeproject.com/aspnet/CaptchaImage.asp
Jeff Atwood http://www.codinghorror.com/

member.name: T:Protean.Tools.Image.CaptchaImage.FontWarpFactor
member.summary: Amount of random font warping to apply to rendered text

member.name: T:Protean.Tools.Image.CaptchaImage.BackgroundNoiseLevel
member.summary: Amount of background noise to add to rendered image

member.name: T:Protean.Tools.Image.CaptchaImage.LineNoiseLevel
member.summary: Amount of curved line noise to add to rendered image

member.name: P:Protean.Tools.Image.CaptchaImage.UniqueId
member.summary: Returns a GUID that uniquely identifies this Captcha

member.name: P:Protean.Tools.Image.CaptchaImage.RenderedAt
member.summary: Returns the date and time this image was last rendered

member.name: P:Protean.Tools.Image.CaptchaImage.Font
member.summary: Font family to use when drawing the Captcha text. If no font is provided, a random font will be chosen from the font whitelist for each character.

member.name: P:Protean.Tools.Image.CaptchaImage.FontWarp
member.summary: Amount of random warping to apply to the Captcha text.

member.name: P:Protean.Tools.Image.CaptchaImage.BackgroundNoise
member.summary: Amount of background noise to apply to the Captcha image.

member.name: P:Protean.Tools.Image.CaptchaImage.TextChars
member.summary: A string of valid characters to use in the Captcha text. A random character will be selected from this string for each character.

member.name: P:Protean.Tools.Image.CaptchaImage.TextLength
member.summary: Number of characters to use in the Captcha text.

member.name: P:Protean.Tools.Image.CaptchaImage.Text
member.summary: Returns the randomly generated Captcha text.

member.name: P:Protean.Tools.Image.CaptchaImage.Width
member.summary: Width of Captcha image to generate, in pixels

member.name: P:Protean.Tools.Image.CaptchaImage.Height
member.summary: Height of Captcha image to generate, in pixels

member.name: P:Protean.Tools.Image.CaptchaImage.FontWhitelist
member.summary: A semicolon-delimited list of valid fonts to use when no font is provided.

member.name: M:Protean.Tools.Image.CaptchaImage.RenderImage
member.summary: Forces a new Captcha image to be generated using current property value settings.

member.name: M:Protean.Tools.Image.CaptchaImage.RandomFontFamily
member.summary: Returns a random font family from the font whitelist

member.name: M:Protean.Tools.Image.CaptchaImage.GenerateRandomText
member.summary: generate random text for the CAPTCHA

member.name: M:Protean.Tools.Image.CaptchaImage.RandomPoint(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32@,System.Int32@)
member.summary: Returns a random point within the specified x and y ranges

member.name: M:Protean.Tools.Image.CaptchaImage.RandomPoint(System.Drawing.Rectangle)
member.summary: Returns a random point within the specified rectangle

member.name: M:Protean.Tools.Image.CaptchaImage.TextPath(System.String,System.Drawing.Font,System.Drawing.Rectangle)
member.summary: Returns a GraphicsPath containing the specified string and font

member.name: M:Protean.Tools.Image.CaptchaImage.GetFont
member.summary: Returns the CAPTCHA font in an appropriate size

member.name: M:Protean.Tools.Image.CaptchaImage.GenerateImagePrivate
member.summary: Renders the CAPTCHA image

member.name: M:Protean.Tools.Image.CaptchaImage.WarpText(System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath,System.Drawing.Rectangle)
member.summary: Warp the provided text GraphicsPath by a variable amount

member.name: M:Protean.Tools.Image.CaptchaImage.AddNoise(System.Drawing.Graphics,System.Drawing.Rectangle)
member.summary: Add a variable level of graphic noise to the image

member.name: M:Protean.Tools.Image.CaptchaImage.AddLine(System.Drawing.Graphics,System.Drawing.Rectangle)
member.summary: Add variable level of curved lines to the image
